price: 41. Waxaana ka yeelnay madax13 wax ugu yeedha Naarta, Maalinta Qiyaamana looma gargaaro.
arabic: وَجَعَلۡنَٰهُمۡ أَئِمَّةٗ يَدۡعُونَ إِلَى ٱلنَّارِۖ وَيَوۡمَ ٱلۡقِيَٰمَةِ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
footnotes: 13. Macnaha waa tusaale, ama mataal xun ay raacaan diktaatoorrada oo dhan iyo madaxda khaa’imiinta ah.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: wajaʿalnāhum a-immatan yadʿūna ilā al-nāri wayawma al-qiyāmati lā yunṣarūna
